definition: race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
Gongshan Derung and Nu autonomous county in Nujiang Lisu autonomous prefecture 怒江傈僳族自治州[Nu4 jiang1 Li4 su4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1] in northwest Yunnan
pinyin: Gong4 shan1 Du2 long2 zu2 Nu4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4
containing_words.word: 贡山独龙族怒族自治县

sentences.english: The Lu People is one of the nationalities that have the smallest population.
sentences.chinese: 怒族是我国人口最少的民族之一。

sentences.english: If you visit the River Nu, you will meet some Nu people who are good at both singing and dancing.
sentences.chinese: 如果你去怒江旅游，就能看到能歌善舞的怒族人。

sentences.english: The family of Da Mashi (Nu ethnic group) has lived on the cliff of Nujiang for 100 years.
sentences.chinese: 怒族打马石家在怒江的悬崖之上住了一百年。

definition: Jingpo ethnic group of Tibet and Yunnan
Wa, Kawa or Va ethnic group of Myanmar, south China and southeast Asia
Blang people, one of the 56 ethnic groups officially recognized by the PRC
Jingpo ethnic group of Tibet and Yunnan
Lhoba ethnic group of southeast Tibet
Hmong or Miao ethnic group of southwest China
